title: Parsley and pea soup with smoked salmon fish cakes
description: Deep-fried mini fishcakes add a crunch to a bowl of fresh, peppery parsley and pea soup.
ingredients: 1 litre/1¾ pints hot vegetable stock (or water)
handful of pea shoots, to serve
225g/8oz floury potatoes, peeled and cut into chunks
salt and freshly ground black pepper
